summary: Relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Dept. of Interior, by and through the Bonneville Power Administration, and with the City of Eugene, Oregon, providing for the purchase by the City of a portion of the output of a nuclear electric generating project to be owned in part of Eugene; and for the assignment of such portion of project output to the Bonneville Power Administrator in consideration of credits to the City of amounts otherwise due said Administrator.
